tag_list: how-to-remove-gold-from-mobiles, how-to-separate-precious-metals-from-computers, get-gold-from-aqua-regia, remove-gold-from-mobiles, remove-gold-from-circuit-boards, gold-recovery-from-e-wastegold, recovery, process, precious, metals, silver, palladium, p
overview:
Our company Urooj International Provides Gold & Silver Recovery Skills. We are in the business of Removing Gold from Electronic Parts for thirty years based in Delhi. We train you to Recover Gold from Computer Parts, Circuit Boards, Ics, Processor Chips, mobiles, telephone exchange boards, discarded electronic boards, telecommunications circuit cards, almost all types of e-waste. It is a very effective one week training programme. You can come to us or learn it online.

Contact: Mr. Saurabh / Sajid Ali Mobile No. 09971582081
